abstract: Stocks fell Thursday as investors were hit by a series of bleak economic reports that signaled further problems for exports and the labor market.
snippet: Stocks fell Thursday as investors were hit by a series of bleak economic reports that signaled further problems for exports and the labor market.
lead_paragraph: Stocks fell Thursday, with the Dow Jones industrial average losing nearly 200 points, as investors were hit by a series of bleak economic reports that signaled further problems for exports and the labor market.

headline.main: After Bleak Export and Labor News, Stocks Fall More Than 2%
headline.print_headline: After Bleak Export and Labor News, Stocks Fall More Than 2%

abstract: Nearly one year later, one of the most prominent critics of Rupert Murdoch’s takeover of Dow Jones has changed his mind. At least, for now.
lead_paragraph: Nearly one year later, one of the most prominent critics of Rupert Murdoch’s takeover of Dow Jones has changed his mind. At least, for now.

headline.main: Murdoch Sways Former Foe on Dow Jones Deal
